title: Wicked Game
lyrics:
[intro] (Bm) (A) (E) x4
 
The (Bm)world was on fire and (A)no one could save me but (E)you
It's (Bm)strange what desire will (A)make foolish people (E)do
(Bm)I never dreamed that (A)I'd meet somebody like (E)you
And (Bm)I never dreamed that (A)I'd love somebody like (E)you
 
[chorus]
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
With (Bm)you (A) (E)
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
 
(Bm) What a wicked (A)game to play... (E) to make me feel this way
(Bm) What a wicked (A)thing to do... (E) to let me dream of you
(Bm) What a wicked (A)thing to say... (E) you never felt this way
(Bm) What a wicked (A)thing to do... (E) to make me dream of you and
 
[chorus]
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                    (This world is only gonna break your heart)
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                    (This world is only gonna break your heart)
With (Bm)you (A) (E)
                    (This world is only gonna break your heart)
 
(Bm) (A) (E) x2
 
The (Bm)world was on fire and (A)no one could save me but (E)you
It's (Bm)strange what desire will (A)make foolish people (E)do
(Bm)I never dreamed that (A)I'd love somebody like (E)you
And (Bm)I never dreamed that (A)I'd lose somebody like (E)you
 
[chorus]
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
No (Bm)I-I-I (A)don't want to fall in (E)love
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
With (Bm)you (A) (E)
                   (This world is only gonna break your heart)
 
(Bm-single strum)Nobody (A-single strum)loves no (E-single strum)one [end]
